articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Moria fire: Greek court jails four Afghan asylum seekers for 10 years - The Guardian
articles.description: Men were charged with arson over blaze that destroyed what was Europe’s largest migrant camp
articles.content:
Four Afghan asylum seekers have been sentenced to 10 years in prison in Greece for their part in a fire that destroyed the Moria migrant camp in 2020.
